TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_plkusan, title = plkusan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/plkusan} }

S.FORM: plkusan lukus ita tayal ga, kyan nanak yow na. lukus mtalah ga, iwan cyan ptasan muyux 'sinuw 'ba na mlikuy Tayal ma. iyat ga cyan ptasan bnh'an lukus na knerin maha kya lela. maki cyoli' kmayan uy ma: hkuy ro mayung na tran lukus Tayal ga, iwan ro'iy na Utux bnkis ma, nya gmlga mlahang ita kwara la'iy na tayal ma, ana ta maki n'inu ga? Utux mlahang inlungan ta ita kwara.nya strhow lungan maha: glgiy ci gaga Tayal, teta ta magan myasa na cinrxan. knayan ta nya cyoli' maha: "ita ga baley na cyoli' Tayal ma."

plkosan lokos ita tayal ga, kyan nanak yow na. lokos mtalah ga, iwan cyan ptasan moyox 'sinow 'ba na mlikoy Tayal ma. iyat ga cyan ptasan bnh'an lokos na knerin maha kya lela. maki cyoli' kmayan oy ma: hkoy ro mayong na tran lokos Tayal ga, iwan ro'iy na Utox bnkis ma, nya gmlga mlahang ita kwara la'iy na tayal ma, ana ta maki n'ino ga? Utox mlahang inlongan ta ita kwara.nya strhow longan maha: glgiy ci gaga Tayal, teta ta magan myasa na cinrxan. knayan ta nya cyoli' maha: "ita ga baley na cyoli' Tayal ma."
